EUMEN
  • »
  • EUMEN

EUMENÂ¶

EUMEN is an enterprise grade quantum hardware computational chemistry platform developed and maintained by CQC. EUMEN is currently in closed beta. For enquiries regarding beta access to EUMEN, please contact eumen-support@cambridgequantum.com.

To install EUMEN: pip install eumen -i <index-url>. The <index-url> is provided with the beta credentials. After installation we recommend getting started by checking out the tutorials included in the private documentation.
